title: karuNaik-kaDalAgum
sahitya:
karuNaik-kaDalAgum murugan irukkaiyil kavalaik-kaDaliDaiyE tavikkalAmO manamE


anupallavi

  dharaNiyil tAmeDutta piravip-payan peravE sharaNamenravaniDam sAruvOrkk-aruLum Or


caraNam    paDi mIdu paDum pADu porukka muDiyAmal toDarum tolvinait-tollaiyAl viLaiyum
iDarellAm maraiyavE inba sukham peravE vaDa pazhaniyil tigazhum vaDivElanait-tozhuvAi
